title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. I, subch. H, pt. 61 - Records To Be Kept
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. I, subch. H, pt. 61 - Records To Be Kept

State Regulations
§ 61.1 - Records required of distributor holding retail license
§ 61.2 - Records required of a retail licensee not a distributor
§ 61.3 - Preservation of records

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. I, subch. H, pt. 61

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §171; art. 18

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
